brand.heading: Branding activation
brand.headline: This option includes:
brand.text-4: Possibility to change text of letter's heading;
brand.text-6: Connect Google Analytics, Facebook Pixel or Yandex.Metrika counter to your player;
brand.text-7: Connect your SMTP gateway, so customers will receive letters with your mail address instead of no-reply
brand.text-8: Connect PayPal account to start monetizing your video content.
brand.text-10: Renewal for the next month is carried out on the date the option is activated. Your manager will definitely contact you to agree and extend the service for the next month.

protection.heading: Video Download Protection activation
protection.text-1: To protect video courses and lessons from downloading, we encrypt information before delivery to the viewer using Clear Key DRM technology. As a result, downloaders and browser extensions either do not see the file or download an encrypted version. Playback of content is possible only through our player, since access is opened with an individual key created for the viewer. The key is transferred automatically, the user does not need to enter anything.
protection.text-2: If the "Download protection" option is active, you can enable the display of dynamic watermarks during browsing. Every 8 seconds, a watermark will appear in a random place on the screen, which contains the name, ip address of the device and the email of the viewer. The mark is translucent and does not interfere with reproduction. To enable the watermark, you should use password, payment or registration form access restriction.
protection.text-4: Renewal for the next month is carried out on the date the option is activated. Your manager will definitely contact you to agree and extend the service for the next month.

bonus.text-2: as a bonus to your account if you replenish the balance within

form.label-1: Enable the feature to get direct links to video transcodes
form.label-7: Match User-Agent to allow access skipping domain protection bellow
form.label-10: Restrict video playback if viewer's referrer is empty
form.text-2: You can upload as many videos as you like to one project.
form.text-3: One entry per line. You can use a part of User-Agent to match result.
form.text-4: Here you specify the domains for which video files are allowed to be played.
form.text-4-1: Domain names must be specified without the http prefix://
form.text-5: This option is based upon verifying a signature appended to your embed code that is generated using a secret signing key. So that a particular embed code is only valid for a unique viewer, ensuring that the embed code cannot be reused.
form.text-5-1: Notice: it’s not enough only to enable this option, you should generate secret signing key on your server side.

countries.GS: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

card.title: Notice
card.text: By default your videos are accessible and playable anywhere in the world. With geo whitelisting you can designate the specific countries or regions where your videos can be played. Once enabled your videos will not load or play in any countries or regions that are not included in your whitelist. If this option is left blank playback will be available anywhere in the world. Playback settings will be changed in 10 minutes.

card.title: Notice
card.text: Change of player skin comes into effect within 10 minutes from the moment the form is saved

form.label-2: Allow to index landing pages by search engines

card.title: Pages for video files
card.text-1: This option enabled allows you to use landing page with player built in. You can connect to it Facebook comments, GA id and more.

logo.text-1: By enabling the "Branding" option, you can place the logo on all videos of your project. The logo size in the player is 48x48 pixels, the file format for downloading .jpeg/jpg/png/svg/webp.
logo.test-2: The system automatically compresses the downloaded file to the specified size.
logo.text-3: If you specify the site address in the "link to the site" window, the user will go to the specified address when clicking on your logo in the player. Specify the address of the type https://boomstream.com
logo.text-4: Using "Margin" and "Position", you can move the logo in the player window.

btnPlay.text-1: By enabling the "Branding" option, you can replace the «Play» button on all videos of your project. The size of the central button in the player is 60x60 pixels, the file format for downloading .jpeg/jpg/png/svg/webp.
btnPlay.text-2: The system automatically compresses the downloaded file to the specified size.

paidAccess.text-1: By enabling the "Branding" option, you can place the logo on the sales interface of your content. The displayed logo size here is 250x50 pixels, the file format for downloading .jpeg/jpg/png/svg/webp.
paidAccess.text-2: The system automatically compresses the downloaded file to the specified size.

letterTemplates.text-1: By enabling the "Branding" option, you can place the logo in the header of emails.
letterTemplates.text-2: The logo size here is 250x50 pixels, the file format for downloading .jpeg/jpg/png/svg/webp.
letterTemplates.text-3: The system automatically compresses the downloaded file to the specified size.
letterTemplates.text-4: By specifying the title of the email, the user will receive the email: Your title...

settingsSMTP.text-1: This option will allow you to send Boomstream template emails from your email address.
settingsSMTP.text-2: In the «SMTP Server» section, you should specify the address of your smtp server. It usually looks like this: smtp.mail.ru , smtp.yandex.ru, smtp.gmail.com
settingsSMTP.text-3: In the «Port» field, you specify the value that is specified by your mail provider. The standard is 25, 465, 587. Please note that for different types of encryption, SSL, TLS, STARTTLS, you need to specify different ports.
settingsSMTP.text-4: In the «Authorization Data» section, you specify the username and password under which you log in to your mail service.
settingsSMTP.text-5: In the «Sender's Data» section, specify the email address from which the emails will be sent. It often coincides with the login for authorization in the mail service. In the «Sender's name» field, enter any information, it is displayed in the mail clients in the section from whom the letter came.
settingsSMTP.text-6: The type of encryption. Check with your mail service which type it supports through search or support. In most cases, this will be an SSL connection. Try using TLS, STARTTLS if the test email is not sent via SSL.
settingsSMTP.text-7: Then click «Save» and «Send test message». If the sending is successful, you will receive a message to the email address that you specified in the «Sender's Details» section.
settingsSMTP.text-8: If we were unable to connect the specified email via SMTP, then you will receive an error notification to your account registration email on Boomstream. In this email, we will return to you the error that your mail server gave us.
settingsSMTP.text-9: Write to support{'@'}boomstream.com for any questions.

domainParking.text-1: Domain parking is necessary so that all links of your project (video files, screenshots, player) contain the name of your domain, and not our system domains.
domainParking.text-2: You can use both second-level domain names (for example, domain.com ), and the third, fourth, etc. level (for example, video.domain.com , a.b.c.domain.com ).
domainParking.text-3: In order to use your domain, you need to:
domainParking.text-4: * In the DNS settings of your site, create a CNAME record that will link to the play domain.boomstream.com.
domainParking.text-5: Please do not specify the domain of your main resource. To park, use a new domain, for example, video.domain.com .
domainParking.text-6: For example, if you want to use a domain video.domain.com then you need to create the following CNAME record:
domainParking.text-8: In your personal account on the "Domain Parking" page, in the «Domain name» field, specify the created CNAME record, for example, video. domain.com
domainParking.text-9: In the «Redirect URL» field, enter the address of your resource without www, for example, http://domain.com
domainParking.text-10: Save and wait for the changes to be applied.
domainParking.text-11: You can read more about CNAME records here.
domainParking.text-12: Attention! We periodically check parked domains. And if, after the next check, the domain does not have a correct CNAME record, media files, screenshots and the player will refer to our system domains until the domain check is successful.

analyticsCounters.text-1: Analytics counters need to be created separately, you can not prescribe already linked counters to other sites/applications.
analyticsCounters.text-2: The Google Analytics counter looks like UA-0123456-1. How to create,
analyticsCounters.text-3: The Yandex Metrika counter looks like 01234567. How to create,
analyticsCounters.text-4: The Facebook Pixel counter looks like 0123062412295558. How to create,

form.text-2: After you click the button below, we will send a test letter to the mail address, written "Sender Email".
form.text-3: If settings are correct, you will receive letter from Sender email and with Sender name.
form.text-4: If something goes wrong, you will receive letter from no-reply{'@'}boomstream.com with an error from your mail service.

card.title: Developer Documentation
card.text-1: Webhooks are designed for URL notification of various events occurring in the Boomstream platform. The following events are currently supported:
card.text-2: A POST request with information about the event is sent to the URL specified in the settings.
card.text-3: To view the output results when using web hooks, follow the link in the documentation
